Improves ball control under defensive pr: Improves ball control under defensive pressure.

Keep your feet moving to stay balanced.
Use your wrists for better ball control.

Finish your shot on your toes to give it: Finish your shot on your toes to give it momentum.
Keep your hand up after the shot.
